root.name: Darkness Within 2: The Dark Lineage
root.description: System RequirementsOS: Windows 2000/XP/VistaCPU: 1,8 Ghz Intel Pentium or equivalent AMDRAM: 512 MB RAM (1 GB Recommended for Windows Vista and 7)Video: 256 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible or better video card (nVidia GeForce 7/ATI Radeon X1600/compatible) and Pixel/Vertex Shader 3.0 supportDrive: 4x speed PC-DVD-ROMHD Space: 3 GBSound: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound cardOther: Mouse, keyboard and sound speakers
